title: Stocks tumble as Trump sparks global trade war fears
text:
Stocks tumble as Trump sparks global trade war fears Friday, March 02, 2018 - 01:45 
The spectre of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminium risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs. David Pollard reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The spectre of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminium risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs.
